markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 26"
    pfs=""
>
[Axe of the Dwarven Lords](/Equipment.aspx?ID=609)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 106</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 3
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Dwarven War Axe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=62)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The blade of this _+4 major striking [keen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=300) [returning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=301) [speed](/Equipment.aspx?ID=304) [dwarven waraxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=62)_ is carved with an intricate design depicting countless generations of great dwarven warriors and leaders. The axe has the [thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195) weapon trait, in addition to the normal weapon traits for a dwarven waraxe. Strikes with the axe deal an additional 1d6 damage to orcs. While the axe is in your possession, you gain a +4 item bonus when [Crafting](/Actions.aspx?ID=43) armor, jewelry, metalworking, stonemasonry, snares, traps, and weapons. If you are a [dwarf](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=1), you gain [greater darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415) while holding the axe. If you are not a dwarf, you are [stupefied 4](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) while holding the axe, and if you are an orc, you are also [drained 4](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) and [enfeebled 4](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) while holding it.

<document level="2" id="action-386" />

**Destruction** If an orc beheads a dwarven king with the _Axe of the Dwarven Lords_, the axe rusts away to nothing.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Axe of the Dwarven Lords
